EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Your Time at ATMIA
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Thank you for taking the time to visit the NCR team at our booth during the ATMIA 2023 event in New Orleans! I hope you enjoyed the conference sessions and had the opportunity to learn about the new and exciting changes occurring in our industry. NCR showcased our ATM solutions at this year’s event, including LibertyX bitcoin purchasing at the ATM which offers expanded revenue opportunities for your business. If you have any questions for the NCR team, please don’t hesitate to contact us. Even better, come and visit our Customer Experience Center at our Atlanta HQ for an in-depth look at our newest innovations! Reach out to your account executive to schedule a visit.
